THERE_ARE_NO_HOLDINGS_FOR_THIS_CUSTOMER: There are no holdings for this customer
THERE_ARE_NO_ASSOCIATED_HOLDINGS_FOR_THI: There are no associated holdings for this customer
INDICATOR_INTEREST_REVIEW_TIME_IN_RANGE_: Interest review date is within {{weekDiff}} week
Interest review date is within {{weekDiff}} weeks
INDICATOR_ACCOUNT_AVAILABLE_BALANCE_HIGH: Available balance is higher than average balance
INDICATOR_ACCOUNT_AVAILABLE_BALANCE_LOWE: Available balance is lower than average balance
INDICATOR_LOAN_PAYMENT_RISK: Loan payment is {{fhDaysPastDue}} days past due - collection at {{risk}} risk
FINANCIAL_INSIGHTS_FEATURE_DESC: Controls the visibility of financial alerts in the financial holdings tab
FINANCIAL_INSIGHTS_FEATURE_SHOW_DESC: Show financial alerts in financial holdings tab
FINANCIAL_INSIGHTS_FEATURE_HIDE_DESC: Hide financial alerts in financial holdings tab
HIDDEN_INFORMATIOM_MAIN: Some parties' information is restricted from view.
HIDDEN_INFORMATIOM_SUB: Amounts shown represent only unrestricted financial information for visible parties.
FINANCIAL_HOLDINGS_DETAILED_HIDDEN_MESSA: Some of the information on this page is hidden due to data restriction
FINANCIAL_HOLDING_HIDE_CATEGORIES_DESC: Hide specific financial holding categories out of the available options set, separated by comma (e.g 104800000,104800001)
NO_INVESTMENTS_PORTFOLIOS: There are no investment portfolios to display
